00026         bool projectileSignal = false;
00027         
00028         BehaviorTreeInternalNode* makeSynchronizedProjectile()
00029         {
00030                 BehaviorTreeInternalNode* brain = new SequentialNode();
00031                 brain->addChild(new WaitForSignal(projectileSignal));
00032                 brain->addChild((new ParallelNode())
00033                         ->addChild(new TurnTowardsTarget(5))
00034                         ->addChild(new GoStraight(7)));
00035                 
00036                 return brain;
00037         }
00038 
00039         void flipProjectileSignal(void* ignore)
00040         {
00041                 projectileSignal = true;
00042         }
00043 
00044         WorldState* loadScenario9()
00045         {
00046                 WorldState* state = new WorldState();
00047 
00048                 GameObject* background = new GameObject();
00049                 background->usesPhysics = false;
00050                 background->setSprite("Backgrounds\\background");
00051                 state->addBackgroundObject(background);
00052 
00053                 Ship* player = new Ship();
00054                 player->setSprite("Hulls\\Sample Hull");
00055                 player->isPlayer = true;
00056                 player->projectileBrain = &makeBoringBrain;
00057                 state->insertObject(player,point(100,300));
00058 
00059                 Ship* director = new Ship();
00060                 director->setSprite("Hulls\\Sample Hull");
00061                 director->HP = INT_MAX;
00062 
00063                 director->projectileBrain = &makeSynchronizedProjectile;
00064                 
00065 
00066 
00067                 director->brain->addChild(
00068                         (new CountLimitNode(1,false))->addChild((new SequentialNode())
00069                         ->addChild(new Fire())
00070                         ->addChild(new Cooldown(500))
00071                         ->addChild(new Fire())
00072                         ->addChild(new Cooldown(500))
00073                         ->addChild(new Fire())
00074                         ->addChild(new Cooldown(500))
00075                         ->addChild(new FunctionCall<>(&flipProjectileSignal))));
00076                 director->brain->addChild(new GotoPoint(point(500,100),500));
00077 
00078                 state->insertObject(director,point(50,100));
00079                 state->rotateObject(director,90);
00080 
00081 
00082                 return state;
00083         }
